yaml.title: Don't Learn AI. Operationalize It.
yaml.description:
**I help Senior Professionals & Business Owners build AI-Enabled Enterprises.**
No theory. No "prompt engineering" fluff. Just operational leverage.

markdown.markdown:
::: {.grid .justify-center} ::: {.g-col-6 .g-row-md-auto} [Join the Bootcamp (Tier 1)](https://YOUR-SYSTEME-IO-LINK.com){.btn .btn-primary .px-4 .py-3 .w-100} ::: ::: {.g-col-6 .g-row-md-auto} [Explore Consulting (Tier 2)](https://cal.com/jitink-kriyalytics/strategy-consulting){.btn .btn-outline-primary .px-4 .py-3 .w-100 target="_blank"} ::: ::: ```{=html}
Strategies Deployed At
```
::: {.padded .text-center} [**IF**]{style="font-size=2.2rem"} ::: {.text-left style="font-size=1.8rem"} → You have 12+ years of experience. → You understand business very well. → You want to grow or make you business grow. → You are managing Multi-millions or Corers of portfolios. → You are having a FOMO of AI Hype → Your boardroom is asking you "What is you AI game-plan?" :::
[**BUT**]{style="font-size=2.2rem"} ::: {.text-left style="font-size=1.8rem"} → **You are still unable to leverage AI** → **You are confused what to use and what not to** → **You are not sure about ROI of AI** → **You have no game-plan/roadmap!** :::
### [If this is you, then you are at right place !!]{.text-center} ::: ::: {.padded } The market is shifting. **Senior** professionals are not being replaced by AI; they are being replaced by *junior* professionals who potentially have **AI Operational Leverage**. These thoughts are not random and honestly, I hear them every other day from CEOs to Non-tech Mangers who are struggling with current day AI Hype. This ***pain of AI is REAL!***
Well, I am **Jitin Kapila**. I am not a "Course Creator." I am an **AI Architect** who has deployed systems for Fortune 500 companies. My goal is simple: **to help you move from "Corporate Employee" to "AI-Enabled Executive."** :::
::: {.padded .bg-warm} ## How can I help You We can work depending on your speed and needs. ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .card} [Tier 1: The AI Profit OS™]{.card-title} **3-Day D.I.Y Implementation Bootcamp** For leaders who want to build their personal AI Operating System in one weekend. We install the **Deep-Research System**, the **Governance Playbook**, and your first **Agentic Workflow**. * **Format:** Live Virtual Sprint (3 Days) * **Next Cohort:** Dec 19-21, 2025 * **Investment:** ~~₹16,650~~ **₹7,490 (Founding Member)** [Secure Your Seat →](https://YOUR-SYSTEME-IO-LINK.com){.btn-primary} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .card} [Tier 2: The AI Profit Accelerator™]{.card-title} **D.W.Y 4-Week Consulting Program** For business owners who need a full **AI-ART Matrix** deployment across Sales, Ops, and HR. We audit your Data Assets, design your _AI Leverage Roadmap_ which you can start from Day 0. * **Format:** Hybrid Consulting (Small Cohort) * **Status:** Application Only * **Investment:** ₹50,000+ [Let's have a word →](https://cal.com/jitink-kriyalytics/strategy-consulting){.btn-primary target="_blank"} ::: ::: ::: ::: {.fixed-section .bg-contrast .text-center} ### The "Unheard Of" Guarantee My reputation is built on ROI, not views. If you join the **AI Profit OS™** and do not save at least 10 hours/week within 30 days, I will refund you 100% **AND** pay you ₹7,500 for your time. **Stop Guessing. Start Architecting.** [Start your AI journey (₹7,490)](https://YOUR-SYSTEME-IO-LINK.com){.btn-primary .btn-large} :::
